item.name: 邢佑强 讲师
item.wait1: 职称讲师政治面貌中共党员办公室机械楼532联系电话18115194554E-mailyqxing@seu.edu.cn个人简介邢佑强，男，1988年生，工学博士。2016年6月毕业于山东大学机械制造及其自动化专业，同年入职东南大学机械工程学院。主要从事切削加工及表面工程等相关研究，主持江苏省自然科学基金、江苏省精密与微细制造技术重点实验室开放基金等项目；目前，以第一作者发表SCI论文18篇，SCI他引280多次，申报国家发明专利15项，已授权6项。教授课程设计原理与方法1 研究方向1. 切削加工及刀具设计制造2. 表面工程（涂层技术、激光处理等）及摩擦磨损3. 仿生微结构设计、制造及应用代表性论著[1]Youqiang Xing, et al.Fabrication and characterization of micro-channels on Al2O3/TiC ceramicproduced by nanosecond laser. Ceramics International 2018, 44: 23035–23044.(SCI).[2]YouqiangXing, et al. Assessment in drilling of C/C-SiC composites using brazed diamond drills. Journal of Manufacturing Processes, 2017, 26: 31-43. (SCI).[3]YouqiangXing, et al. Experimental assessment of laser textured cutting tools in dry cutting of aluminum alloys. ASME-Journal of Manufacturing Science and Engineering, 2016, 138: 071006. (SCI).[4]YouqiangXing, et al. Effect of laser surface textures combined with multi-solid lubricant coatings on the tribological properties of Al2O3/TiC ceramic. Wear, 2015, 342-343: 1-12. (SCI)[5]YouqiangXing,et al. Fabrication and performances of Si3N4/TiC ceramic tools reinforced with the PVD WS2/Zr soft-coatings in dry cutting. Ceramics International, 2015, 41:10261-10271. (SCI)[6]YouqiangXing, et al. Fabrication and tribological properties of Al2O3/TiC ceramic with nano-textures and WS2/Zr soft-coatings. Surface and Coatings Technology, 2014, 258: 699-710. (SCI)[7]YouqiangXing, et al. Cutting performance and wear characteristics of Al2O3/TiC ceramic cutting tools with WS2/Zr soft-coatings and nano-textures in dry cutting. Wear, 2014, 318: 12-26. (SCI)[8]YouqiangXing, et al. Cutting performance and wear mechanism of nanoscale and microscale textured Al2O3/TiC ceramic tools in dry cutting of hardened steel. International Journal of Refractory Metals and Hard Materials, 2014, 43: 46-58. (SCI)[9]YouqiangXing, et al. Multiple nanoscale parallel grooves formed on Si3N4/TiC ceramic by femtosecond pulsed laser. Applied Surface Science, 2014, 289: 62-71. (SCI)[10]YouqiangXing, et al. Effect of laser surface texturing on Si3N4/TiC ceramic sliding against steel under dry friction. Materials and Design, 2013, 52: 234-245. (SCI)科研项目项目名称项目类别项目时间工作类别PCD表面激光诱导液体等离子体微织构加工技术研究陕西省特种加工重点实验室开放基金2017.10-2019.10主持微织构与ta-C涂层复合功效刀具的设计制备及润滑作用机理研究江苏省自然科学基金青年基金2017.07-2020.06主持专利序号专利号专利名称专利类型[1]ZL 201710541381.8一种激光熔覆石墨烯-陶瓷自润滑涂层刀具及其制备方法发明专利/授权[2]ZL 201710123384.X一种B-Cr-ta-C涂层刀具及其制备方法发明专利/授权[3]ZL 201610928498.7一种添加氧化铝包覆石墨烯的自润滑陶瓷刀具材料发明专利/授权[4]ZL 201610948350.X一种手术器械刃口表面的处理方法发明专利/授权[5]ZL201310465488.0一种激光熔覆软硬复合涂层自润滑刀具的制备方法发明专利/授权[6]ZL201210447210.6一种微纳复合织构自润滑陶瓷刀具及其制备方法发明专利/授权
